meanings.definition: A piece of land planted with fruit trees.
meanings.sent1: The orchard was filled with apple trees.
meanings.sent2: We picked juicy peaches from the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel caused chaos in the orchard.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an orchard of creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The scent of blossoms filled the orchard with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A group of fruit trees planted together.
meanings.sent1: The orchard provided a bountiful harvest of oranges.
meanings.sent2: The farmers tended to the orchard with care.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped happily in the orchard.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like an orchard of love and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The orchard glowed in the golden light of sunset.
